title: How to Make Pineapple Fritters

steps.headline: Mix the first seven ingredients in a bowl and it set aside.
Combine the flour, milk, and  eggs.
steps.description: Add the salt and pepper and beat well with an electric mixer.

steps.headline: Put the mixture in a mixing bowl, and refrigerate for about 4 hours.
Remove from the refrigerator, and combine the fruit and batter.
Heat the vegetable oil in a deep skillet.
steps.description: When the oil is hot, slowly drop the batter in by spoonfuls, and fry for about 5 minutes, or until they are a golden brown.

steps.headline: Remove fritters and drain on paper towels.
steps.description: Serve cold, garnished with pineapple chunks or rings, if desired.

text: Mix the first seven ingredients in a bowl and it set aside.  Combine the flour, milk, and  eggs. Add the salt and pepper and beat well with an electric mixer. Put the mixture in a mixing bowl, and refrigerate for about 4 hours.  Remove from the refrigerator, and combine the fruit and batter.  Heat the vegetable oil in a deep skillet. When the oil is hot, slowly drop the batter in by spoonfuls, and fry for about 5 minutes, or until they are a golden brown. Remove fritters and drain on paper towels. Serve cold, garnished with pineapple chunks or rings, if desired. Serves 6.
